title: General Order 143- explain impact on troops

content.question: Based on the passage, which of the following can most directly be inferred about African American troops in the Civil War?

choices.label: African American soldiers were mostly people who were formerly enslaved.
African American soldiers agreed to serve in the military to obtain citizenship.
African American troops received the same pay as white soldiers.
African American troops served in segregated units.

content.answer: African American troops served in segregated units.

topic.text: 2.23: The Civil War and Black Communities

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
